item.title: Trump to Pardon Juan Orlando Hernández, Honduran Ex-Leader Convicted in Drug Case
item.description: Juan Orlando Hernández was accused of receiving millions in bribes and partnering with cocaine traffickers. He was convicted in Manhattan in 2024 and ...

item.title: State Department Boosts Resources to Process Business Visas for South Koreans
item.description: The Trump administration has been trying to repair the damage from the detention of hundreds of South Koreans in an immigration raid in Georgia.

item.title: South Africans Were Promised Job, but Ended Up ‘Going to War’ for Russia
item.description: The South African government is investigating how more than a dozen men unwittingly ended up on the front line in Russia’s war on Ukraine.

item.title: Where Hundreds of Undocumented Migrants Have Died in Custody
item.description: Malaysia launched a “year of enforcement” in response to a surge in undocumented migrants, many of them from Myanmar. Some faced nightmarish fates.

item.title: Trump’s Response to Shooting Shows Intensified Anti-Migrant Stance
item.description: The president is furiously demanding limits on migration and attacking ethnic groups as he steps up his efforts to equate immigration with crime and e...
